django.template.loader
======================

.. py:module:: django.template.loader


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.template.loader.get_template
   django.template.loader.select_template

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: get_template(template_name, using=None)

   Load and return a template for the given name.

   Raise TemplateDoesNotExist if no such template exists.


.. py:function:: select_template(template_name_list, using=None)

   Load and return a template for one of the given names.

   Try names in order and return the first template found.

   Raise TemplateDoesNotExist if no such template exists.


.. py:function:: render_to_string(template_name, context=None, request=None, using=None)

   Load a template and render it with a context. Return a string.

   template_name may be a string or a list of strings.
